description:
Makers of some of the most popular pedals in the game, Crank Brothers takes it a step further. Wide strap and speed laces keep these shoes light without sending you all the way back to the dark ages of shoes with laces laces. A stiff shank and custom tread grab your pedal pins and transfer power through all your ups and the downs.

  • Ventilated uppers with a breathable perforated tongue
  • TPU overlay protects from pedal spikes
  • Speed lace system and strap tune the perfect fit
  • Lace pocket keeps your speed lace away from hungry chain rings
  • Internal grip in the heel cup keep your foot anchored
  • Stamp tread and custom lug depth offer a secure connection
  • Stiff shank maximizes power transfer
  • MC2 rubber outsole balances grip and durability
  • Match outsole has a ramped toe and aggressive lugs for comfort and traction while hike-a-biking
name: Crankbrothers Stamp Speedlace Cycling Shoes - Unisex
